body_html: The genesis of the fix is due to a merge down for the generics stuff, so it makes more sense (imo) to include it in the PR for the generics stuff and not as a postscript to it.
body_text: The genesis of the fix is due to a merge down for the generics stuff, so it makes more sense (imo) to include it in the PR for the generics stuff and not as a postscript to it.
body: The genesis of the fix is due to [a merge down for the generics stuff,](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/11535/commits/46981fb61c393a1b32b6e4569ac2e3e5c47b240f) so it makes more sense (imo) to include it in the PR for the generics stuff and not as a postscript to it.
